name: online-code-editor
description: Web-based code editor with LSP support

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=server && npm install --workspace=web
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd web && npm run dev"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=server && npm run build --workspace=web
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=server && npm run test --workspace=web
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit --workspace=server && npm run test:unit --workspace=web
scripts.test:property: npm run test:property --workspace=server && npm run test:property --workspace=web
